title: Photograph, "View of the main altar and left chapel of an unidentified church (from above)", 1904–13
title_raw: View of the main altar and left chapel of an unidentified church (from above)
description:
Designed by Leon Dabo (1868–1960); for J. and R. Lamb Co.
Vertical rectangle: View of the chancel and left side chapel from above the right balcony. High pointed arches along the nave with clustered columns. Stained glass window of five panels above painting of Christ and Elders; other to the left.

Same church as 1961-83-7 & -8.

tombstone.epitaph: Photograph, "View of the main altar and left chapel of an unidentified church (from above)", 1904–13. Printed on sensitized paper. 1961-83-9.
